mourn.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to feel very sad and to miss someone after they have died
mourn.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Hundreds of people gathered to mourn the slain president.
She still mourns the death of her husband.
They mourned for their children, killed in the war.
mourn.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to feel very sad because something no longer exists or is no longer as good as it used to be
mourn.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The old steam trains were much loved, and we all mourn their passing.
